channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: The Latin Grammys are almost here for a 25th anniversary celebration
item.description: The 2024 Latin Grammy Awards are here and back in Miami. It’s a big year: the award show is celebrating its 25th anniversary, and Latin music genres have never been bigger globally.

item.title: Stock market today: World shares are mixed after Wall Street’s mixed finish, as dollar surges
item.description: Shares have opened higher in Europe after mostly falling in Asia following a report showing inflation in the U.S. was roughly as expected last month.

item.title: Republican Rep. Juan Ciscomani wins reelection to Arizona US House seat
item.description: Republican Rep. Juan Ciscomani has won reelection to a U.S. House seat in southeastern Arizona. With his win, Republicans have enough seats to control the U.S. House.
